source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT TABLE_CATALOG,TABLE_SCHEMA,TABLE_NAME 
                FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
				WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'DBO'

SELECT TABLE_CATALOG,TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME FROM information_schema.TABLES
WHERE  TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo'

SELECT TABLE_CATALOG,TABLE_SCHEMA,TABLE_NAME
                    FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
					WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'DBO'
